# serverName

**Instance Property**

The TLS name of a DNS-over-TLS server.

## Declaration

```swift
var serverName: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The server will be accessed over TCP port 853, as defined in [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7858]. The server name is used for TLS validation.

## Configuring server properties

- **init(servers:)**: Initialize the `NEDNSSetting` object.
- **matchDomains**: A list of domain strings used to determine which DNS queries will use the DNS resolver settings contained in this object.
